com.actionbarsherlock.internal.widget
Class ScrollingTabContainerView

java.lang.Object
  android.view.View
      android.view.ViewGroup
          android.widget.FrameLayout
              android.widget.HorizontalScrollView
                  com.actionbarsherlock.internal.nineoldandroids.widget.NineHorizontalScrollView
                      com.actionbarsherlock.internal.widget.ScrollingTabContainerView
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent, IcsAdapterView.OnItemSelectedListener
public class ScrollingTabContainerView
extends NineHorizontalScrollView
implements IcsAdapterView.OnItemSelectedListener

This widget implements the dynamic action bar tab behavior that can change across different configurations or circumstances.

onItemSelected

public void onItemSelected(IcsAdapterView<?> parent,
                           android.view.View view,
                           int position,
                           long id)
Description copied from interface: IcsAdapterView.OnItemSelectedListener

Callback method to be invoked when an item in this view has been selected. This callback is invoked only when the newly selected position is different from the previously selected position or if there was no selected item.

Impelmenters can call getItemAtPosition(position) if they need to access the data associated with the selected item.

Specified by:
onItemSelected in interface IcsAdapterView.OnItemSelectedListener
Parameters:
parent - The AdapterView where the selection happened
view - The view within the AdapterView that was clicked
position - The position of the view in the adapter
id - The row id of the item that is selected

onNothingSelected

public void onNothingSelected(IcsAdapterView<?> parent)
Description copied from interface: IcsAdapterView.OnItemSelectedListener
Callback method to be invoked when the selection disappears from this view. The selection can disappear for instance when touch is activated or when the adapter becomes empty.

Specified by:
onNothingSelected in interface IcsAdapterView.OnItemSelectedListener
Parameters:
parent - The AdapterView that now contains no selected item.
